actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the use of the zero bracket amount will not reduce the benefits of income averaging.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the zero bracket amount shall be subtracted from an individual's taxable income when using income averaging in order to tax the averaged income in the same manner, and to the same extent, it was taxed when the standard deduction was used in tax computations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the use of the zero bracket amount will not reduce the benefits of income averaging.
